import React from 'react' import { Card, Container, Row, Col, Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faUser, faComment } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; const BlogScreen = () => { return (
{/* Antoine Hi! My name is Antoine and I'm French. People say that I'm kind and outgoing person! Last summer I was in Barcelona with my parents and I fell in love with Spanish language. So I'm really looking forward to all the people speaking Spanish. As a native French speaker I can help you with my language, and you are going to help me in my language learning path. Please text me if you are interested!!!! */} Antoine Hi! My name is Antoine and I'm French. People say that I'm kind and outgoing person! Peter Hi! My name is Antoine and I'm French. People say that I'm kind and outgoing person! Li Hua Hi! My name is Antoine and I'm French. People say that I'm kind and outgoing person! Antoine Hi! My name is Antoine and I'm French. People say that I'm kind and outgoing person! Antoine Hi! My name is Antoine and I'm French. People say that I'm kind and outgoing person!
) } export default BlogScreen
